maqras.text: 43|57|Va cun dostoni [tavalludi] pisari Marjam matrah sud, qavmi tu [ki gumon kardand, metavonand monandi masehijon cand ma'ʙud dosta ʙosand] ʙa nogoh sodi va hajohu ʙa roh andoxtand
43|58|Va guftand: «Ma'ʙudoni mo ʙehtarand jo Iso»? Onon in suxanro tanho ʙaroi cidol ʙo tu unvon kardaand. Ba rosti, ki guruhe sitezacu hastand
43|59|Iso faqat ʙandaest, ki ʙar u ne'mat [-i risolat] arzoni dostem va uro namunae [az qudrati ilohi] ʙaroi Bani Isroil qaror dodem
43|60|Agar mexostem, [hamai sumo insonhoro noʙud mekardem va] ʙa cojaton faristagone padid meovardem, ki dar zamin conisin [-i sumo] savand
43|61|[Tavalludi] Iso [ʙa mu'cizai hajot ʙaxsidanas] dalele ʙaroi qijomat ast. Pas, hargiz dar mavridi qijomat sak nakuned va pajravi man ʙosed, ki rohi rost hamin ast
43|62|[Ogoh ʙosed, ki] Sajton sumoro [az rohi Alloh taolo] ʙoznadorad, caro ki u dusmani oskori sumost

43|63|Va cun Iso [mu'cizotu] nisonahoi ravsan ʙar onon iroa kard, guft: «Man ʙaroi sumo hikmat ovardaam, to [ʙad-on roh joʙed] va ʙarxe az mavoridi ixtilofatonro ravsan kunam, pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mute'i [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
43|64|Alloh taolo Parvardigori man va sumost, pas, Uro ʙiparasted, ki rohi rost hamin ast»
43|65|On goh guruhhoi [muxtalifi] Bani Isroil mijoni xud [dar ʙorai Iso] ducori ixtilof sudand, pas, voj ʙar sitamgoron az azoʙi ruzi dardnok
43|66|Ojo cuz in intizor dorand, ki qijomat, dar hole ki ƣofiland, nogahon ʙar onon faro rasad
43|67|Duston [-i dunjoi] dar on ruz dusmani jakdigarand, magar parhezkoron
43|68|[Alloh taolo ʙa onon mefarmojad] «Ej ʙandagoni [parhezkori] Man imruz tarsu anduhe naxohed dost
43|69|Hamon ʙandagone, ki ʙa ojoti Mo imon ovardaand va taslim [-i farmoni Mo] ʙudand
43|70|Sumo va digar mu'minone, ki hamcun sumo hastand, ʙa ʙihist daroed, to [az ne'mathoi covidonas ʙahramand garded va] sodmon saved
43|71|Zarfho va comhoi zarin peromunason megardonand va har ci dilho ʙixohad va didaho lazzat ʙarad, dar on co hast va sumo dar ʙihist covidonaed
43|72|In hamon ʙihistest, ki dar ʙarorʙari raftoraton ʙa sumo dodaand
43|73|Dar onco mevahoi farovone dar ixtijor dored, ki az onho mexured
43|74|Be tardid, mucrimon dar azoʙi duzax covidonand
43|75|[Dar hole ki azoʙ] az onon kosta namesavad va dar ja'su noumedi furu raftaand
43|76|Mo ʙa onon sitam nakardaem, ʙalki onho xud ʙa xestan sitam mekardand
43|77|[Duzaxijon] Nigahʙoni otasro sado mezanand va farjod ʙar meorand: «Ej Molik [kos] Parvardigorat kori moro jaksara kunad [va ʙimironad]» U megujad: «Na, sumo [dar in azoʙ] mondagored»
43|78|Ba rosti, haqro ʙaroi sumo ovardem, vale ʙestaraton az on karohat dosted
43|79|Onon azmi [xudro ʙaroi tavtea alajhi tu] cazm kardand, Mo niz irodai muhkame [ʙar nokom guzostani eson] dorem
43|80|Ojo mepindorand, ki Mo suxanoni sirri va nacvojasonro namesunavem? Ore, faristagoni Mo dar kanorason [hastand va hama cizro] saʙt mekunand
43|81|[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa musrikon] ʙigu: «Agar [ʙa farzi mahol Allohi] Rahmon farzande dost, man naxustin parastisgar [-i U] ʙudam»
43|82|[Ma'ʙudi jaktoe, ki] Parvardigori osmonho va zamin va Ars ast, az tavsifi [cohilonai] onon munazzah ast
43|83|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] ononro [ʙa holi xud] ʙiguzor, to jovagui kunand va ʙa ʙozi sargarm ʙosand, to sarancom ʙo ruzi mav'ud [qijomat] muvoceh savand [va sazoi a'molasonro ʙuʙinand]
43|84|Ust, ki dar osmon va zamin ma'ʙud ast va U hakimi donost

43|85|Purʙarakat va ʙuzurgvor ast kase, ki farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin va on ci mijoni onhost, az oni Ust va ogohi az [lahzai ʙarpoii] rastoxez tanho dar ixtijori Ust va [hamagi] ʙa pesgohi U ʙozgardonda mesaved
43|86|Kasone, ki [musrikon] ʙa coji Alloh taolo [ʙa nijois] mexonand, qodir ʙa safoat nestand, magar afrode, ki ʙa [kalimai tavhid va] haq az rui ilm guvohi medihand
43|87|Agar az musrikon ʙipursi, ci kase ononro ofaridaast, musallaman, megujand: «Alloh taolo». Pas, ci guna [az haq] ʙar megardand
43|88|[Sikojat va] Suxani pajomʙar [in ʙud]: «Parvardigoro, inon qavme hastand, ki imon nameovarand»
43|89|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] az onon darguzar va [ʙaroi rahoi az sarrason] ʙigu: «Salom ʙar Sumo»! Ba zudi xohand donist [ki azoʙason ci guna ast]
44|1|Ho, mim
44|2|Savgand ʙa kitoʙi ravsangar
44|3|Mo Qur'onro dar saʙi muʙorak [va farxundai qadr] nozil kardem, [zero] ki Mo [hamvora] husdordihanda ʙudaem
44|4|Dar on [saʙ] har amri muhimme fajsala mejoʙad [va tadʙir mesavad]
44|5|[In] korest [ki] az coniʙi Mo [surat megirad] ʙe gumon, Mo firistandai [pajomʙaron] ʙudaem
44|6|Ba unvoni rahmate az Parvardigorat. Be tardid, U sunavoi donost
44|7|Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va on ci mijoni onhost. Agar [ʙa in haqiqat] jaqin dored [ʙa Alloh taolo va Pajomʙaras imon ʙijovared]
44|8|Hec ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz U nest, zindagi meʙaxsad va memironad. Parvardigori sumo va nijogoni sumost
44|9|Vale musrikon tardid dorand va sargarmi [lazzathoi dunjo] va ʙozi hastand
44|10|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] muntaziri ruze ʙos, ki osmon, dude oskor [padid] ovarad
44|11|Ki [tamomi] mardumro faro megirad. In azoʙe dardnok ast
44|12|[On goh kofiron megujand] «Parvardigoro, [in] azoʙro az mo ʙartaraf kun, ki imon ovardaem»
44|13|Ci guna [va az kuco] pand mepazirand, dar hole ki [pestar] pajomʙari ravsangar ʙa sujason omada ʙud
44|14|Ammo az u ruj gardonidand va guftand: «[U] omuzisjoftai devona ast»
44|15|[Baroi ozmoisi sumo] Zamone andak azoʙro ʙarmedorem, va [-le] sumo [ʙa kufri xes] ʙozmegarded
44|16|Ruze saxt ʙar onon metozem. [Ore] Mo [az kofiron ʙa xotiri kufru takziʙason] intiqom megirem
